name: AddVehicleComponent
warnings: Using an invalid component ID crashes the player's game. There are no internal checks for this.
description: Adds a 'component' (often referred to as a 'mod' (modification)) to a vehicle. Valid components can be found here.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to add the component to. Not to be confused with modelid.

params_body.name: componentid
params_body.description: The ID of the component to add to the vehicle.

return_values:
0 - The component was not added because the vehicle does not exist.

 1 - The component was successfully added to the vehicle.
related_fn:
RemoveVehicleComponent: Remove a component from a vehicle.
 GetVehicleComponentInSlot: Check what components a vehicle has.
 GetVehicleComponentType: Check the type of component via the ID.
 OnVehicleMod: Called when a vehicle is modded.
 OnEnterExitModShop: Called when a vehicle enters or exits a mod shop.
related_cb:
OnVehicleMod: Called when a vehicle is modded.
 OnEnterExitModShop: Called when a vehicle enters or exits a mod shop.
